title: Sir Rito
body:
Sir Rito. Melee Support

**Passive: EUW**. Basic Attachs increase enemy champions PING by 20, stacking up to 5 times. (opt: At 5 stacks they get a DC for 1 sec)
**Q: Nerfhammer**. Permanently reduces enemies stats for no reason, until they are out of combat. 
**W: Buffing shield**. Increases allies stats for a few seconds.
**E: Champion spotlight.** Sends out a wave of energy. If it hits an enemy champion, he is revealed and rooted for a few seconds.
**R: The Tribunal / The Ban Hammer.** Removes an enemy player from the game (for a few seconds). He then spawns right where he was and as he was. He has no vision or chat during that time.

Instead of Mana he has an RP bar.

im having diffuculty in my ranked division, can someone help me with tips in duo q? i will pay per win, please i just want to get better and get out of bronze!!
are you serious? im not sure how much you pay per win. but you realise that it would have to be like 20$ at _**least**_? Also, getting out of bronze doesnt mean you wont go back in lol.

{{champion:201}}:  Here is how to get better:  Think carefully, my friend.  Keep your spirits high.  When life gives you curdled milk, be patient. You get very good cheese!  No time for worrying.  These are keys to victory.  You can always trust Braum!  Do not disregard the attitude you bring to the game.  If you believe you can do well, you can do well!  Is that simple.  Mindset is key in any game.  Skill is good, yes, but you must first believe in yourself.  

Treat each game as practice, even ranked.  Try to always do better than the last one.  Push yourself, but know your limits.  Feel like you are on tilt?  Play a bot game.  People are silly there.  You see many goofs and off-meta things, but in the end everyone enjoys themselves.  Is lots of fun.  Bots do not teach skill, but they let you have fun.  This is a game after all!  In a bad mood?  Relax.  Log off for a bit.  Play a different game for a while.  League of Legends is a game, but it can be stressful.  Sometimes Poros are easier to herd than teammates...  When you feel yourself getting too frustrated at yours (teammates or Poros), finish the game you are in, then go find a distraction somewhere else.  You may think you are worthy of being a pro, and you may yet be.  In spite of asking for what is basically elo-boosting, you may actually have skill yourself.  Never forget that.  But also do not forget that you are NOT a Pro.  You do not rely on games for money and you probably started playing to have fun.  Keep that in mind.  This is a game.  Play for fun or to relieve stress.  Never let it cause stress for you.  You will find that you do better with this in mind.  I guarantee it.  

As for payment...  I think 100 Poro-Snax per win is good, yes?  :}D
